评论详情: Gorgeous dress and fit really well. The fabric was nice and was very comfortable.
Beautiful dress but was missing the strings for the corset so I had to return it
Did it's job on my first date.
Very pretty dress but in my first looping of the corset ribbons, one of the eyelets (the thing that you have to string the ribbon through) broke and so the dress didn't look right :-(

This was the perfect homecoming dress for my teenage daughter. It fit as expected. She usually wears a medium, but the large was shipping faster, so it was a little big on her but still fit fine. We were able to adjust the laces and back accordingly. For reference she’s 5 foot 10 and 145 pounds very pleased with the purchase.
Zipper broke first time worn

I bought this for my Goth teen daughter for after Prom. She loves it. The lacing at the waist snugs it up beautifully. Alternately, she has since worn this several times to other events with a corset. It looks cute either way. Laundering is a breeze. My only concession is I do put it in a laundry bag to prevent the lace from snags. For how inexpensive this dress is, I honestly wasn't expecting much. But it's comfortable, looks good, and is easy to care for.

It is adorable, I paired it with a petticoat and shrug. I received a bunch of compliments for it on our valentines dinner date. The material is thin, and a few threads are fraying on the edge, but it is really comfortable and cute!
The dress is beautiful but the dress didn't come with the string to make it a corset on the sides!
Got this for a valentines dress for a date, it fit great and was very comfortable.
I wore this dress to a party one night only. At then end of the night, I took off the dress and noticed the lace separated from the fabric.
Super cute and actually really comfortable too!  Fits true to size.

This dress was made for me. The lace looks so elegant. The fabric was comfortable even Corset tied in perfectly. It can be worn for many different occasions. Worn already to a wedding and a birthday party. I highly recommend.
It was a little uncomfortable in the chest area & the quality wasn’t the best either.
Great for Halloween or just a dress.

The dress itself fits comfortably, the material is light and stretches in the torso which is great. The deep purple color is beautiful.  Unfortunately, the cups are sown in and the adjustable shoulder straps do not have a large range. For reference I am 5' 5" at 140lbs, I wear a size 34DD. My chest fits and is covered properly, but the cups sit awkwardly. It doesn't look awkward, but it feels just off enough that I constantly feel the need to adjust.  Overall I do really like it.

I wore this dress to my first ever school dance, and I got many compliments on it, I love the dress and I will continue to wear it, but I would recommend getting new ribbons for it, they didn't work as well
excelente
The was great! The size ties make it perfect to fit various body shapes 👍 A+
In the picture it’s thicker! Maybe you should tell your customers that
The sizing was a bit on the small side so go one size up
not high quality material but it looks okay
Thinner material than I anticipated but did it's Job ...for a halloween costume.
pretty but order larger size
